Inspired Sneakers with Technical Looks One-half of the adidas NMD R1 Primeknit "Tri-Color" Pack, this clean take on 2016's most woven Primeknit features a Core Black-tinted woven Primeknit upper. A white Boost midsole balance out the shoe.
